articles.author: Emily Maskell
articles.title: Iconic children's show Bluey makes history with show's first LGBTQ+ characters - PinkNews
articles.description: Disney+’s preschool show Bluey has joined the likes of Peppa Pig and Paw Patrol as a kids' show that includes LGBTQ+ characters and topics.
articles.content:
Disney+s animated preschool show Bluey has joined the likes of Peppa Pig and Paw Patrol as a kids’ show that includes LGBTQ+ characters and topics.
